title: Remember Self-Control: Bossy Husband Loves Me Deep to Soul - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Josei   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
author: 欢脱兔
description: Having been married for two years, he only takes her as an enemy. He never touches her, and even insult her in front of other women, “Si Wan, you are the most disgusting woman in the world.” Facing his ruthlessness, she decides to leave, “Gong Siming, if you don’t love, just let me go.” But he replied dominantly, “Si Wan, of course I love you.” Si Wan is caught in a trance. And he goes on, “I want to love you tenderly every night.”>
